statements: SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_id = 1;
SELECT faculty_name, research_interests FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_id > 3 ORDER BY faculty_name ASC;
SELECT faculty_id, teaching_schedule FROM Faculty WHERE research_interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_name LIKE 'Dr%' ORDER BY faculty_id DESC;
SELECT faculty_name, research_interests FROM Faculty WHERE teaching_schedule LIKE '%Monday%';
SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT faculty_name, research_interests FROM Faculty WHERE teaching_schedule IS NOT NULL ORDER BY faculty_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE research_interests LIKE '%machine learning%' AND teaching_schedule LIKE '%Monday%';
SELECT DISTINCT faculty_name FROM Faculty ORDER BY faculty_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Faculty;
SELECT faculty_id, faculty_name FROM Faculty;
SELECT faculty_id, faculty_name, research_interests FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Teaching_Schedule ORDER BY time_of_day ASC;
SELECT course_name, room_number, faculty_id FROM Teaching_Schedule WHERE room_number = '101';
SELECT faculty_id, faculty_name FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE teaching_schedule LIKE '%Monday%';
SELECT faculty_name, course_name, room_number FROM Faculty INNER JOIN Teaching_Schedule ON Faculty.faculty_id = Teaching_Schedule.faculty_id;
SELECT faculty_id, research_interests FROM Faculty WHERE research_interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE teaching_schedule LIKE '%9:00 AM%' ORDER BY faculty_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Faculty;
SELECT faculty_name, department FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_id = 'c49ac0b1-7a5d-479e-936f-0fc301b5e7e3';
SELECT faculty_name, course_name, schedule_date FROM Faculty JOIN TeachingSchedule ON Faculty.faculty_id = TeachingSchedule.faculty_id;
SELECT * FROM ResearchInterests WHERE interest_topic LIKE '%data%';
SELECT faculty_name, interest_topic FROM Faculty JOIN ResearchInterests ON Faculty.faculty_id = ResearchInterests.faculty_id;
SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT faculty_name, department FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT Schedule.schedule_date, Faculty.faculty_name, ResearchInterests.interest_topic FROM (TeachingSchedule as Schedule JOIN Faculty ON Schedule.faculty_id = Faculty.faculty_id) JOIN ResearchInterests ON Faculty.faculty_id = ResearchInterests.faculty_id WHERE Schedule.course_name = 'Mathematics';
SELECT * FROM TeachingSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT Faculty.faculty_name, ResearchInterests.interest_topic, TeachingSchedule.course_name FROM (Faculty JOIN TeachingSchedule ON Faculty.faculty_id = TeachingSchedule.faculty_id) JOIN ResearchInterests ON Faculty.faculty_id = ResearchInterests.faculty_id WHERE Faculty.department = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM faculty_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM faculty_info WHERE department='Computer Science';
SELECT faculty_id, first_name, last_name FROM faculty_info ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM teaching_schedule WHERE day_of_week='Monday' AND start_time > '08:00';
SELECT faculty_id, research_area FROM research_interests WHERE research_area LIKE '%Machine Learning%';
SELECT * FROM faculty_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM faculty_info WHERE department='Computer Science';
SELECT faculty_id, first_name, last_name, email, department FROM faculty_info WHERE faculty_id=1;
SELECT faculty_id, first_name, department FROM faculty_info ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT fi.faculty_id, fi.first_name, rs.research_area FROM faculty_info fi JOIN research_interests rs ON fi.faculty_id = rs.faculty_id;
SELECT * FROM Faculty;
SELECT faculty_id, faculty_name FROM Faculty ORDER BY faculty_id DESC;
SELECT faculty_name, teaching_schedule FROM Faculty WHERE teaching_schedule IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_code, course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_description LIKE '%introduction%';
SELECT faculty_name, research_area FROM Faculty JOIN ResearchInterests ON Faculty.faculty_id = ResearchInterests.faculty_id;
SELECT * FROM Faculty;
SELECT faculty_id, faculty_name FROM Faculty WHERE teaching_schedule IS NOT NULL;
SELECT faculty_name, research_area FROM Faculty JOIN ResearchInterests ON Faculty.faculty_id = ResearchInterests.faculty_id;
SELECT course_code, course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE LENGTH(course_description) > 100;
SELECT f.faculty_id, f.faculty_name, c.course_code, c.course_name FROM Faculty f JOIN FacultyCourses fc ON f.faculty_id = fc.faculty_id JOIN Courses c ON fc.course_code = c.course_code;
